question.qText: All of the following were differences between Calvinism and Catholicism EXCEPT

aBtn.aText: <font>Calvinism enforced a strict hierarchy whereas the Catholic church did not.</font>
<font>Calvinism incorporated two sacraments whereas the Catholic church believed in seven sacraments.</font>
<font>Calvinism allowed its clergy members to marry whereas the Catholic church did not.</font>
<font>Calvinism emphasized that everyone should read the Bible whereas the Catholic church did not.</font>
<font>Calvinists utilized newer translations of the Bible whereas the Catholic church did not.</font>
